directions: Toss all the ingredients except the lettuce together in a large bowl. To serve, arrange the lettuce leaves on a large platter and spoon the salad into the center.
ingredients: 2 cups peeled, diced (1/2 inch) cooked potatoes
3 cups (1 pound) diced (1/2 inch) medium-rare leftover roast beef
2/3 cup mixed diced (1/4 inch) red and green bell peppers
title: Roast Beef Salad
